node.text: We organised the Pondo Explorer hike of the Wild Coast through Active Escapes/Sarah and everything was absolutely brilliant! The hike was exceptionally organised and tailor-made with all logistics and every amenity taken care of. The hike itself was absolutely spectacular and I cannot recommend exploring this untouched coastal area enough. The overnight camps were in perfectly pristine locations, all next to beaches and estuaries and we were well looked after by the friendly guides and camp managers. I would never visit this area with a different company - Sarah/Active Escapes were superb and made for an unforgettable and incredible hiking experience and Im already trying to figure out dates to organise another - If you haven't visited the area or used Active Escapes before - go do so NOW!!!!!

I got in touch with Active Escape to prepare a cycling trip at the Wild Coast. They proved to be very responsive and really eager to do their best to ensure that we have a good time. I am very grateful to their staff for their advices and I hope to go back soon for an adventure with them!

The Dronkvlei ramblers group of 23 ambled from Port St Johns to Port Edward. Trip was superbly organised right down too the weather and whales. Would highly recommend to anyone contemplating taking an amble anywhere in R.S.A. Thank you Sarah.

Great experience on the 3-day Amphitheatre Hike! We had a wonderful experience on the Amphitheatre Hike with Active Escapes, everything was well organized, great logging, good guides, good food and perfect logistics. We had a thoughtful support from the team while planning our trip and on site. Thanks!

Our of group of 20 (European and Asian based) just finished a 6N Drakensberg and Battlefields adventure under the expert advice and guidance of Sarah and Active Escapes. The combination of taking a middle aged team of trekkers to their healthy limit  during the day and facilitating 4 convivial lodge locations for the evening unwind was an amazing eye opener for our group. Active Escapes arranged our international links, challenging trekking ( Amphitheatre and Cathedral Peak in particular ), guides, porters and accommodation. Sarahâ€™s patience, enthusiasm and constant smile only added to the experience. 20 new converts to the wilds and wonders that the SA outdoors has to offer. Bravo!
